title: India Hits One Billion Covid-19 Vaccines Administered
sub_head: The government celebrated the milestone following struggles with the inoculation effort earlier this year
body:
NEW DELHIâ€”India said it had administered one billion Covid-19 vaccines, hitting a milestone in a once-faltering campaign and signaling that the country could begin allowing more vaccine exports soon.
While India has still only given two doses to about 31% of the adult population, the government celebrated the achievement Thursday. The country of more than 1.3 billion, which has been devastated by the pandemic, is second only to China in the total number of doses administered.
